sn22.136:1.2: “Mendicants, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are burning chaff.
sn22.136:1.3: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn22.136:1.4: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they’re freed, they know they’re freed.
sn22.136:1.5: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
